altogether.translation[0].definitions[0]: used to emphasize that something has been done completely or has finished completely
an old custom that has vanished altogether
Congress could ban the procession altogether.
altogether.translation[0].definitions[1]: used to emphasize that the way you describe something is completely true
In Canada, the situation is altogether different.
This latest problem is altogether more serious.
I wasn’t altogether happy about Mike staying over.
The results were not altogether surprising.
altogether.translation[0].definitions[2]: used to show that you are referring to the total amount
How much do I owe you altogether?
altogether.translation[0].definitions[3]: used to make a final statement about several things you have just mentioned
Lots of sunshine, wonderful food, and amazing nightlife – altogether a great vacation!
